Class LineStyle

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.chart.style.AbstractStyle

public class LineStyle
extends AbstractStyle

The style for a line of the chart

Field Summary
static BasicStroke DEFAULT_STROKE
          The default stroke is a solid line of default width, with CAP_BUTT and JOIN_BEVEL
static int DEFAULT_WIDTH
          The default width is 1 pixel.
